name: 謝東儒
objective: 使學生熟悉計算機圖的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： （１）二維及三維幾何圖形之產生 （２）二維及三維何圖形之轉換 （３）隱藏面及隱藏線之處理（４）色彩原理 （５）光影及暗影技術 學生將需撰寫電腦程式或使用幾何算圖程式。
schedule:
Graphics Systems and Models
Imaging Systems
Clipping, Bresenham's Algorithm
Graphics Programming
Geometric Objects and Transformation
Viewing and Projections
Input and Interaction
Lighting and Shading
From Vertices to Fragments
Discrete Techniques, Texture Mapping
Programmable Shaders
Modeling, Scene Graph
Curves and Surfaces
Advanced Rendering
Ray Tracing
Scientific Visualization
materials: OpenGL Programming Guide: The Official Guide to Learning OpenGL, Version 2.1 (6th Edition), Addison Wesley, 2006.
